Alchemist Zephyra:
And, so, You want to learn Alchemy. Perfect! Now I will briefly tell You about it.
Alchemy is not only the art of mixing different items to create Stones of the Wind, but also the transformation Potions, Scrolls Mods, Stones of Life, color and so on by using items from this world.
You are a child of Saihi, so You can work with the spirits of the Wind. But to call them necessarily need the alembic.
